channel.title: Developer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Developer gets 4 years for activating network “kill switch” to avenge his firing
item.description: Disgruntled developer was caught after naming the “kill switch” after himself.

item.title: Developer survey shows trust in AI coding tools is falling as usage rises
item.description: “AI solutions that are almost right, but not quite” lead to more debugging work.
